nodes.bodyText: Not related to this task directly but it seems that this test class does not require Spring context to run -> could remove the annotations @RunWith(SpringRunner.class) and @SpringBootTest above to make the test run  much faster. But IIRC there already is a task on the works to improve our tests?
Actually I don't think we have a ticket? I have just worked on the issue outside of ticketing. Maybe would be good to create one.
